sen.j: 天平9年（737年）における天然痘の猖獗によって父をはじめとする藤原四兄弟が急死すると、藤原氏の氏上となり、急遽兵部省1.兵部省に、続いて参議に任命された。
sen.e: After his family including his father and Fujiwara four brothers died suddenly of the outbreak of smallpox in 737, he became the head of the Fujiwara clan and then was appointed to an official of Kyobusho (the Ministry of War) on very short notice followed by Sangi (Royal Advisors).

sen.j: 天平勝宝8年（756年）、大炊王（淳仁天皇）が弟藤原仲麻呂の後押しで立太子したことから、政権の外に押し出され気味となり、翌年の橘奈良麻呂の乱に連座して大宰権帥に落とされた。
sen.e: Due to the investiture of Prince Oi (Emperor Junnin) as Crown Prince supported by FUJIWARA no Nakamaro in 756, he was rather excluded from the government, and then demoted to Dazai gon no sochi (Provisional Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices) for complicity in the Rebellion of TACHIBANA no Naramaro occurring the following year.

sen.j: だが、これに抗議の意を込めて「病気」と称して難波にあった自分の別荘に籠ったため、大宰府行きは無期延期状態となり豊成はそこで8年間の隠遁生活を送った。
sen.e: His assignment to Dazaifu (local government office in Kyusyu region) was postponed because Toyonari shut himself in his second home in Nanba under the guise of "illness" to protest against it, and then lived in retirement there for eight years.

sen.j: 天平宝字8年（764年）、仲麻呂が道鏡排斥に失敗して失脚し殺害された後（藤原仲麻呂の乱）、従一位右大臣として復帰した。
sen.e: He came back to the post as Juichii Udaijin (Minister of the Right with Junior First Rank) after Nakamaro lost his position and was killed due to the failure in driving Dokyo out of office (Rebellion of Fujiwara no Nakamaro) in 764.

sen.j: 内室藤原百能（ももよ）は豊成の死後、十二女司で絶大な地位を固めることになる。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Momoyo, Toyonari's wife solidified position in Junimeno tsukasa (the twelve women's offices in the palace) after his death.
